domainName.description: The domain name for Toby Bot's API & Website.

startup.name: Startup presence
startup.description: The presence that appears the first 15 seconds after the bot starts

shutdown.name: Shutdown presence
shutdown.description: The presence that appears when the bot stops

custom.name: Custom presence
custom.description: The presence that appears when the presence mode is set to 'custom'.

time.name: Presence loop time
time.description: The time in millisecond that the presence will loop.

presences.name: Presence loop presences
presences.description: The presences that the bot will loop in 'loop' mode.

success.description: The color of the success embeds

error.name: Error embed color

warning.name: Warning embed color

main.name: Main embed color
main.description: The color of the main embeds

users.name: Blocked users
users.description: Users defined here will not be entirely ignored by TobyBot (not entirely, i lied, automoderation will still affect them).

guilds.name: Blocked guilds
guilds.description: Guilds defined here will not be entirely ignored by TobyBot.
